872540.name: Pure Farming 2018 - Joskin Pack
872540.description:
Make your Pure Farming 2018 bigger! For the first time, enhance your farming efficiency with 5 new machines from the JOSKIN brand.
The JOSKIN Pack includes:

- JOSKIN Volumetra 20 000 – Slurry Tanker
- JOSKIN Pendislide PRO – Spreading Boom
- JOSKIN Trans-KTP 27/55 – Tipping Trailer
- JOSKIN Silo-Space 2 – Silage Trailer
- JOSKIN Betimax RDS 7500 – Livestock Trailer

Once downloaded, one item of each new machine will be available in the in-game store for free. You can buy more with the in-game currency.
872540.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 捷克语, 波兰语, 俄语, 匈牙利语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
